results.title: Downsizing in Retirement: Expenses They Didn’t Expect
results.abstract: On the way to spending less, people often have to shell out more, at least temporarily — especially when selling a home. Here’s what to consider.

media.caption: Louise Angel Kiss and her husband, Charles, moved to a retirement community in Issaquah, Wash., a few years ago. They weren’t able to sell their old home until they spent thousands of dollars renovating it.

results.title: Ukraine Attacks Russia Along Northern Front, Swiftly Making Gains
results.abstract: Sweeping south from positions in the Kharkiv region in Ukraine’s northeast, Ukrainian forces have made their largest gains since routing Russia from Kyiv in April.

media.caption: Ukrainian fighters in Kharkiv on Friday. President Volodymyr Zelensky said his military had captured large chunks of occupied territory in the north.

results.title: Clover Lawns Are Blooming in Front Yards, and on TikTok
results.abstract: Amid droughts and extreme heat, people are welcoming clover into their lawns, an alternative to the purely grass lawn, helping them save water and money.
